content: परिगत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Surrounded, enclosed, encircled; <ls>Māl. 4. 10.</ls> {@--2@} Diffused, spread around; <ls>Ś. 7. 35.</ls> {@--3@} Known, understood; <ls>R. 7. 71</ls>; परिगतपरिगंतव्य एव भवान् <ls>Ve. 3</ls>; <ls>Mv. 3. 47.</ls> {@--4@} Filled or covered with, possessed of (usually in <ab>comp.</ab>); <ls>Śi. 9. 26.</ls> {@--5@} Got, obtained; <ls>Bh. 3. 52.</ls> {@--6@} Remembered. {@--7@} Overcome, overwhelmed. {@--8@} Affected by, afflicted with; <ls>Pt. 1. 49.</ls> {@--9@} Performed. {@--10@} Forgotten. {@--11@} Obstructed, hindered.
